results.title: The use of metformin for type 2 diabetes prevention: Observational multicenter study from Saudi Arabia
results.text_hl: Meanwhile, Moin et al. reported that 3.7% of working, insured adults with @<m>DISEASE_Prediabetic_State</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin Prescription for U.S. Veterans with Prediabetes, 2010-2019.
results.text_hl: Among 1,059,605 Veterans with incident @<m>DISEASE_Prediabetic_State</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@, 12,009 (1.1%) were prescribed @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ during an average 3.4 years of observation after diagnosis.
